title: Group Setting Colour Picker Crash
body:
tapped on colour picker and app crashed,


https://assembly-vc.slack.com/files/jarradhope/F1BBAPRNH/no-colours-for-jarrad.mp4

a design for this exists, it’s somewhat of a panel that pops up from bottom ontop of the form (the design has over a different screen so only need to focus on the bottom part)

https://zpl.io/Z2kVEKM
